filmography.title: Kiss of Death
filmography.role_description: A police sergeant who interrogates the protagonist; an early role in a classic noir that showcased Malden's authority.
filmography.plot: An ex-con trying to go straight is forced to help the district attorney capture a sadistic killer.

filmography.title: The Gunfighter
filmography.role_description: The pragmatic and weary bartender who tries to keep the peace when a notorious gunslinger walks into his saloon.
filmography.plot: A notorious gunslinger is challenged by a young gunfighter who wants to make a name for himself.

filmography.title: Where the Sidewalk Ends
filmography.role_description: A police lieutenant and superior officer to a brutal detective, trying to manage a department prone to violence.
filmography.plot: A police detective accidentally kills a suspect and tries to pin it on a gang leader, but falls for the suspect's widow.

filmography.title: Halls of Montezuma
filmography.role_description: A pharmacy mate in the Marines who provides medical aid and wisdom during the invasion of a Japanese-held island.
filmography.plot: Marines battle the Japanese on a heavily fortified island while their commander deals with his own personal issues.

filmography.title: A Streetcar Named Desire
filmography.role_description: A shy, sensitive, and lonely man who courts Blanche DuBois, only to be crushed by the revelation of her past.
filmography.plot: Disturbed Blanche DuBois moves in with her sister in New Orleans and is tormented by her brutish brother-in-law while her reality crumbles.

filmography.title: Ruby Gentry
filmography.role_description: A wealthy swamp-town tycoon who marries a poor girl from the wrong side of the tracks, inciting the jealousy of her former lover.
filmography.plot: A poor North Carolina girl is rejected by the local gentry but ends up marrying the town's wealthiest man.

filmography.title: I Confess
filmography.role_description: A determined police inspector who suspects a priest of murder, unaware that the priest is bound by the seal of confession.
filmography.plot: A priest comes under suspicion for murder, and cannot clear his name without breaking the seal of the confessional.

filmography.title: Phantom of the Rue Morgue
filmography.role_description: A mad psychologist who uses a trained gorilla to commit murders in 19th-century Paris.
filmography.plot: A mad scientist uses a gorilla to kill various women in Paris, while police try to track him down.

filmography.title: On the Waterfront
filmography.role_description: A tough, chain-smoking waterfront priest who inspires Terry Malloy to stand up against the corrupt union mobsters.
filmography.plot: An ex-prize fighter turned longshoreman struggles to stand up to his corrupt union bosses.

filmography.title: Baby Doll
filmography.role_description: A struggling, middle-aged cotton gin owner married to a teenage bride who refuses to consummate their marriage.
filmography.plot: A child bride holds her husband at bay while a rival businessman attempts to seduce her to destroy her husband.

filmography.title: Fear Strikes Out
filmography.role_description: The domineering, perfectionist father of baseball player Jimmy Piersall, who pushes his son to a mental breakdown.
filmography.plot: The true story of baseball player Jimmy Piersall, who battles mental illness caused by the intense pressure from his father.

filmography.title: The Hanging Tree
filmography.role_description: A sleazy, opportunistic prospector who tries to steal a gold claim and assault a blind woman.
filmography.plot: A doctor saves a criminal from a mob, who then tries to control the life of a young woman.

filmography.title: Pollyanna
filmography.role_description: A fire-and-brimstone preacher who is softened by the optimism of a young orphan girl.
filmography.plot: A young girl comes to an embittered town and confronts its attitude with her determination to see the best in life.

filmography.title: One-Eyed Jacks
filmography.role_description: A former outlaw who betrays his partner to become a respectable sheriff, eventually facing his friend's revenge.
filmography.plot: After robbing a Mexican bank, Dad Longworth takes the loot and leaves his partner Rio to be captured, but Rio eventually escapes and searches for revenge.

filmography.title: Birdman of Alcatraz
filmography.role_description: A strict, by-the-book prison warden who serves as the lifelong antagonist to prisoner Robert Stroud.
filmography.plot: A surly convicted murderer held in permanent isolation redeems himself when he becomes a renowned bird expert.

filmography.title: Gypsy
filmography.role_description: The loyal, long-suffering agent and boyfriend of the domineering stage mother Rose.
filmography.plot: The rise of burlesque star Gypsy Rose Lee and her complex relationship with her domineering mother, Rose.

filmography.title: How the West Was Won
filmography.role_description: A patriarch leading his family westward on a raft, facing the perils of the frontier.
filmography.plot: A family saga covering several decades of Westward expansion in the 19th century, including the Gold Rush and the Civil War.

filmography.title: Cheyenne Autumn
filmography.role_description: A rigid, rule-bound German-born U.S. Army captain who commands the fort where the Cheyenne are detained.
filmography.plot: The Cheyenne Indians embark on a perilous trek back to their ancestral lands, pursued by the US Cavalry.

filmography.title: The Cincinnati Kid
filmography.role_description: A respected card dealer who is blackmailed into fixing a high-stakes poker game.
filmography.plot: An up-and-coming pool player plays a long-time champion in a single high-stakes match.

filmography.title: Nevada Smith
filmography.role_description: An outlaw leader who unknowingly teaches the man hunting him (Steve McQueen) how to shoot.
filmography.plot: A mixed-race cowboy sets out to avenge the death of his parents at the hands of three outlaws.

filmography.title: Billion Dollar Brain
filmography.role_description: An old friend of Harry Palmer who is running a spy network in Finland, entangled with a supercomputer.
filmography.plot: A former British secret agent is forced out of retirement to help his old friend dismantle a computer that threatens world peace.

filmography.title: Patton
filmography.role_description: The calm, sensible 'GI's General' who serves as a foil to the flamboyant George S. Patton.
filmography.plot: The biography of the controversial World War II hero General George S. Patton.

filmography.title: The Cat o' Nine Tails
filmography.role_description: A blind puzzle-maker who teams up with a reporter to investigate a series of murders involving a genetic research institute.
filmography.plot: A newspaper reporter and a retired, blind journalist try to solve a series of killings connected to a pharmaceutical company.

filmography.title: Meteor
filmography.role_description: A NASA official who must coordinate with the Soviets to stop a massive meteor from striking Earth.
filmography.plot: The U.S. must join forces with the U.S.S.R. to destroy a gigantic meteor heading straight for Earth.

filmography.title: Nuts
filmography.role_description: The wealthy, controlling stepfather of a woman fighting to prove her sanity in court.
filmography.plot: A high-class call girl kills a client in self-defense and fights to stand trial rather than be declared insane.
